title: Implementing RAG with ChromaDB and IBM Watson for PDF Document QA
author: Prgya Gupta
description: This Python code demonstrates a pipeline for creating a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system utilizing ChromaDB and IBM Watson Machine Learning (Watsonx.ai) to perform question answering (QA) on PDF documents.

installDependencyCommands: pip install numpy python-dotenv langchain sentence-transformers chromadb ibm-watson-machine-learning pypdf
